name: Chocolate Layer Cake
description: A decadent three-layer chocolate cake with rich chocolate frosting. Perfect for birthdays and special occasions. Made with high-quality cocoa and real butter for the most indulgent chocolate experience.

name: Cookie Assortment Box
description: A beautiful box of assorted cookies including chocolate chip, oatmeal raisin, and sugar cookies. Each cookie is handcrafted and decorated with care. Perfect for gifts or special treats.

name: Artisan Sourdough Bread
description: Freshly baked sourdough bread with a crispy crust and tangy flavor. Made with my own starter that's been lovingly maintained for over a year. Perfect for sandwiches, toast, or simply with butter.

name: Vanilla Cupcakes with Buttercream
description: Light and fluffy vanilla cupcakes topped with smooth buttercream frosting. Available in various colors and decorations. Perfect for parties, celebrations, or just because!

name: Fudgy Chocolate Brownies
description: Rich, fudgy brownies with a crackly top and gooey center. Made with dark chocolate and real butter for the most decadent brownie experience. Can be customized with nuts or chocolate chips.
